import math
def ncr(n,r):
    f = math.factorial
    return f(n)/(f(r)*f(n-r))
       
t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    a = map(int , raw_input().split())
    k = input()
    a.sort()
    temp=a[11 - k] 
    r = n= 0
    for j in xrange(11-k, 11):
        if temp == a[j]:
            r += 1
    for j in xrange(11):
        if temp == a[j]:
            n += 1
    
    print ncr(n,r)
